aboutusintro.title: About Shiv Brass Industries
aboutusintro.subtitle: Leaders in precision brass component manufacturing
aboutusintro.description: Established with a vision to provide high-quality brass components, Shiv Brass Industries has grown to become a trusted partner for automotive, aerospace, pneumatic, and hydraulic industries. Our commitment to excellence, precision manufacturing, and customer satisfaction drives everything we do.

expertise.title: Our Industry Expertise
expertise.subtitle: Specialized brass components for critical applications
expertise.description: Shiv Brass Industries serves diverse sectors with precision-engineered brass components designed for demanding applications.

sectors.name: Automotive Industry
sectors.description: High-performance brass components for automotive applications including engine parts, fuel systems, and transmission components.

sectors.name: Electrical & Electronics
sectors.description: Precision brass electrical components for reliable connectivity and conductivity in various electronic systems.

sectors.name: Construction & Plumbing
sectors.description: Durable brass fittings and components for construction, plumbing, and infrastructure applications.

sectors.name: Marine Applications
sectors.description: Corrosion-resistant brass components designed for harsh marine environments and maritime applications.

sectors.name: Aerospace Industry
sectors.description: Precision brass components meeting stringent aerospace standards for aircraft and space applications.

sectors.name: Industrial Machinery
sectors.description: Heavy-duty brass components for industrial machinery, processing equipment, and manufacturing systems.

sectors.name: HVAC Systems
sectors.description: Specialized brass components for heating, ventilation, and air conditioning systems.

sectors.name: Oil & Gas
sectors.description: High-pressure brass components designed for demanding oil and gas exploration and processing applications.

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.subtitle: Trusted partnerships built on quality and reliability

items.name: Rajesh Kumar
items.content: Shiv Brass Industries has been our trusted supplier for automotive brass components for over 8 years. Their quality consistency and timely delivery have been exceptional.

items.name: Sarah Johnson
items.content: The precision and quality standards maintained by Shiv Brass Industries meet our stringent aerospace requirements. Excellent partnership for critical components.

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.subtitle: Common questions about our brass components and services

items.question: What is the minimum order quantity?
items.answer: Our minimum order quantity varies by product complexity and specifications. For standard components, we accept orders starting from 100 pieces. Custom components may have different MOQ requirements.

items.question: What are the typical lead times?
items.answer: Standard brass components typically have a lead time of 2-4 weeks. Custom forged components may require 4-6 weeks depending on complexity and tooling requirements.

cta.title: Ready to Experience Brass Manufacturing Excellence?
cta.subtitle: Partner with Shiv Brass Industries for precision-engineered brass components that meet your exact specifications and quality standards.
